name: ai-autofill
description: AI-powered browser extension for intelligent form auto-filling using Google Gemini and RAG

scripts.setup: npm install && echo "✅ Setup complete!" && echo "📝 Next steps:" && echo "   1. Get your Google Gemini API key from: https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey" && echo "   2. Edit start.bat (Windows) or start.sh (Unix/Linux) and replace YOUR_API_KEY_HERE" && echo "   3. Run the startup script to start the server" && echo "   4. Load the extension in Chrome"

author: Your Name
